text: The Other Side of Midnight is a 1977 drama movie directed by Charles Jarrott and adapted from the 1973 novel of the same name by Sidney Sheldon. It stars Susan Sarandon, John Beck, Marie-France Pisier, Clu Gulager, Christian Marquand and was nominated for an Oscar in 1978. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1977 romantic drama movies Category:1977 romance movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Charles Jarrott Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about aviation
title: The Other Side of Midnight (movie)
